Constituent.Name: Nitrogen
Constituent.Description: 2002 Total Phosphorus Model for the Southeastern U.S. (MRB2)

Source.Name: Wet dep. of inorg. nitrogen
Source.Description: Wet deposition of inorganic nitrogen (ammonia and nitrate) 2002, from K. Savvas, USGS, 2006

Source.Name: Fert. applied to agric. land
Source.Description: Nitrogen fertilizer on farmland 2002, kg - NLCD01 - area-based method Terziotti 10-2008

Source.Name: Livestock manure
Source.Description: Nitrogen in livestock waste 2002 Ag Census, NLCD01 - based spatial distribution, Terziotti 10-2008

CommonTerms.Term:
Each model has different sources that were determined by statistically significant by the modeler. Choose a source from the list to present data only from that source. This model contains these sources:
All Not really a separate source, it just tallies all the sources together. Reported in kg. Wastewater Discharge Phosphorus load from point source dischargers in 2002, kg, Terziotti, 10-200. Reported in kg. Urban Land Area Urban land area , 2001 NLCD, Terziotti 12-2008 Backgrd-Parent Rock Phosphorus content of bed sediment in headwater streams v15, regionalized, multiplied by catchment area, Terziotti and others 2010 Mined Lands P content of bed sediment in streams affected by mines v15, multiplied by mined-land area, Terziotti and others 2010 Livestock Manure 2002 Ag Census, NLCD01-based spatial distribution, sum of confined-unconfined, Wieczorek 5-2009 Fert. Land 2001 NLCD, Terziotti 12-2008
